original_title: A Standard Love Song: Arik Einstein
overview: A musical biography of one of the most influential and iconic figures in the history of Israeli culture.  "A Standard Love Song" is a musical biography of Arik Einstein, the artist whose voice was an anchor of Israeli culture, and whose story is the story of Tel Aviv and of Israel and Israelis: dreamers, warriors, artists and lovers.
title: A Standard Love Song: Arik Einstein
